title: Messages not in Sent...
creator: sboard
content:
Messages that I send from my phone to not upload to my Sent folder -- despite the fact that I have the "Upload sent messages" box ticked.

Any insight?

Thanks.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:136.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/136.0

title: Confirm on send...
creator: sboard
content:
My phone sometimes demands that I do other things while trying to compose an email. While doing those things, it is possible to accidentally touch the "send" icon.

There are plenty of confirm settings, but the only one that I consider essential -- or am even interested in --doesn't seem to be there. This is the one feature of Maildroid that I really miss.

Is "confirm sending message" an option that's in the works?

Thanks.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:136.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/136.0

title: How do I archive a email with Thunderbird for Android?
creator: tcbanjo
content: How do I archive a email? I also see tic boxes to delete/archive/copy/move... are folders available?
